actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Administrator of General Services to enter into agreements for the construction and improvement of border stations on the United States international borders with Canada and Mexico, and for other purposes.
short_title: North American Border Stations Improvements Act

summary.text: North American Border Stations Improvements Act - Authorizes the Administrator of the General Services Administration to enter into agreements with State and local governments or private U.S. corporations for the construction of border stations on the borders of the United States with Canada and Mexico. Sets forth agreement requirements and terms.

titles.title: North American Border Stations Improvements Act

A bill to authorize the Administrator of General Services to enter into agreements for the construction and improvement of border stations on the United States international borders with Canada and Mexico, and for other purposes.
